Package net.sourceforge.plantuml.klimt.awt

Class XAffineTransform

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.plantuml.klimt.awt.XAffineTransform
public class XAffineTransform extends Object
Thin wrapper around AffineTransform. Delegates all operations to an internal AffineTransform instance.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    XAffineTransform()
    Creates an identity transform.
    XAffineTransform(double[] flatMatrix)
    Creates a transform from a 6-element array (m00, m10, m01, m11, m02, m12).
    XAffineTransform(double m00, double m10, double m01, double m11, double m02, double m12)
    Creates a transform from the 6 specified values.
    XAffineTransform(XAffineTransform other)
    Copy constructor.
